sets.2-Piece Bonus: Increases all continual, channeled, and persistent ground damage by 15%.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Each time you damage an individual enemy 5 times, you deal additional damage to that enemy.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Each time you deal damage, you have a chance to unleash a lightning strike, dealing AoE damage and stunning enemies.
sets.Use Case: Best for DoT, channeled, or AoE damage builds.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Grants a chance to gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 13% of your maximum Life.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: When the shield expires, it deals damage to nearby enemies equal to 40% of the damage absorbed.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Increases all damage you deal by 10% while the shield is active.
Primary Attacks have a 5% chance to increase your Attack Speed for 10 seconds.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Each time you defeat an enemy, you gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Damage dealt increased by 2.5% for every 5% increase in your Movement Speed, up to 25%.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Movement Speed bonuses can now stack 10 times, further increasing damage per stack.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Gain Thousand Winds, increasing your Movement Speed by 15%. Thousand Winds deactivates if you take damage.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Thousand Winds also grants a 20% increase in damage dealt.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Gain immunity to damage for 1 second after Thousand Winds deactivates.
sets.Use Case: Suited for kiting, mobility builds, or speed-focused gameplay.

sets.4-Piece Bonus: Critical Hit Chance increased by 3% for each of your summons, up to a maximum of 18%.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Your summons enter a frenzied state, increasing their Attack Speed by 60% for 10 seconds when they critically hit.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Increases the duration of your crowd control effects by 30%.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Increases all damage by 15% to enemies suffering from loss of control effects.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Unleashes a nova of ice, damaging and freezing enemies when you defeat a controlled enemy.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you and your allies by 30%.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Increases Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds after using a beneficial effect.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Doubles the duration of beneficial effects applied to you.
sets.Use Case: Best for support or team-focused builds.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Gain bonus damage for 3 seconds after using a dash skill.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Increases Critical Hit Chance for 3 seconds after dashing.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: AoE explosion around your dash target, dealing heavy damage.
sets.Use Case: Perfect for burst damage builds using mobility.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Increases damage by 15% to enemies who are slowed, stunned, or immobilized.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Increases your Critical Hit Damage by 25%.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Inflicting crowd control effects on enemies triggers a damaging AoE explosion.
sets.Use Case: Best for crowd control and critical damage synergies.

sets.4-Piece Bonus: Nearby enemies drop bonus gold when you defeat them.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Increases gold find in areas by 50%.
sets.Use Case: Focused on gold farming and niche utility.

sets.4-Piece Bonus: Enemies afflicted by burn take an additional 15% damage.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Burning damage has a chance to chain to nearby enemies.

sets.4-Piece Bonus: Enemies afflicted by cold take an additional 15% damage.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Frozen enemies explode upon death, dealing AoE damage.

sets.2-Piece Bonus: Summons flaming allies that attack nearby enemies periodically.
sets.4-Piece Bonus: Increases damage dealt while summons are active.
sets.6-Piece Bonus: Flaming allies periodically explode, dealing heavy AoE damage.
